imageAlt: An unnaturally long looking hallway with walls.The walls are lined with unsettling paintings of heads painted in an old looking style. Halfway down the visale hallway the floor seems to split as if half of it was being reflected by a mirror. In the middle of the hallway is the entrance to another, much darker one. The end of the hallway splits off into two more as if it would go on forever.

A dark and rundown factory setting, lights on the walls are no longer working and rust can be seen on all of the metallic walls. Two hallways are connected by a 90* angle, both leading further into the compound. One has a pair of stairs, half of which has caved in. A long, dark, and narrow hallway can be seen past the stairs.

The skull of what seems to be a goat is wrapped in black cloth, almost like it is wearing a hoodie. It has two bulging white balls where its eyes should be. Itâ€™s moth is also slightly ajar with a crooked smile.

A rundown workshop with skulls littered around all of the desks all of which are in a different state of decay.Whoever was here left seems to have left in a rush, the place almost seems to have been frozen in time since then.

A creature is captured on a low quality camera running through dark woods. It has a very bright glow coming off of it, it also has distorted human-like features. Its arms are very thin and it appears to be crawling on its hands and knees.
